alert.note: Alert for Athens; Meigs; Vinton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 11:26PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Meigs, northeastern Vinton and southwestern Athens Counties through MIDNIGHT EDT... At 1126 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mcarthur, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Athens, Albany, Lake Hope State Park, Chauncey, Zaleski, Amesville, Darwin, Stroud Run State Park and The Plains. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
